description:
The Creatanium project was launched in May 2018 as part of Singapore-based Blockchain company PLMP Fintech's vision to create platforms and opportunities for SMEs to grow their businesses in the region.

The firm’s own coin, CMB, acts as a collateralized asset for SME loans and utility token for cross-border B2B transactions.

The educational arm of the project, Creatanium Academy, provides SMEs with courses, seminars and hands-on workshops on sales techniques and Blockchain applications that can benefit their operations or expansion plans.
name: Creatanium
